ivardefs.name: communicationMethod
ivardefs.desc: The method by which attested information was submitted/retrieved (manual; API; Push).

ivardefs.name: date
ivardefs.desc: The date the information was attested to.

ivardefs.name: onBehalfOf
ivardefs.desc: When the who is asserting on behalf of another (organization or individual).

ivardefs.name: proxyIdentityCertificate
ivardefs.desc: A digital identity certificate associated with the proxy entity submitting attested information on behalf of the attestation source.

ivardefs.name: proxySignature
ivardefs.desc: Signed assertion by the proxy entity indicating that they have the right to submit attested information on behalf of the attestation source.

ivardefs.name: sourceIdentityCertificate
ivardefs.desc: A digital identity certificate associated with the attestation source.

ivardefs.name: sourceSignature
ivardefs.desc: Signed assertion by the attestation source that they have attested to the information.

ivardefs.name: who
ivardefs.desc: The individual or organization attesting to information.

properties.desc: Information about the entity attesting to information.
